ValidationRule.description: You cannot enter a value in Authorization Sent to CAM until there is a value in the following fields: Court Document Received, Kit Received, Authorization Received, Sungard number, Fund allocation, EE Search ID, Alt Payee Search ID
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISBLANK( X401_k_PEP__c ) && RecordType.Name = 'QDRO' && NOT ISBLANK( Authorization_Sent_to_CAM__c ) && (
ISBLANK(Court_Document_Received__c) || ISBLANK( Kit_Received__c )|| ISBLANK( Authorization_Received__c)|| ISBLANK(SunGard_Number__c )|| ISPICKVAL( Fund_Allocation__c,"" )|| ISBLANK( EE_Search_ID__c )|| ISBLANK(Alt_Payee_Search_ID__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter a value in Authorization Sent to CAM until there is a value in the following fields: Court Document Received, Kit Received, Authorization Received, Sungard number, Fund allocation, EE Search ID, Alt Payee Search ID
